title: Drink 2L of Water
description: Stay hydrated by drinking 2 liters of water today!
fullDescription: Water is essential for life. Your goal is to drink 8 glasses (250ml each) throughout the day. Track your progress!

title: Read 10 Pages
description: Read at least 10 pages of a non-fiction book.
fullDescription: Expand your mind. Pick a book on psychology, finance, or coding and read 10 pages without distraction.

title: 100 Pushups
fullDescription: You don't have to do them all at once. Break them into sets of 10 or 20. Focus on form!

title: Sketch a Tree
description: Go outside and sketch a tree in 5 minutes.
fullDescription: Observe nature. Don't worry about making it a masterpiece. Just focus on the shapes and shadows.
